scripts.start: cd test; sam local invoke --event sam_event.json
scripts.clean: rm -rf deploy/nodejs && rm -rf deploy/function && rm -rf deploy/.terraform && rm -rf deploy/.terraform.lock.hcl && rm -rf deploy/*.zip
scripts.build-layer: cd deploy && mkdir -p nodejs && cp -R ../package*.json nodejs/ && cd nodejs && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.build-function: cd deploy && mkdir -p function && cp -R ../src/* ../package*.json function/
scripts.deploy: cd deploy && npm run build-layer && npm run build-function && pwd && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file=ca.tfvars
scripts.destroy: cd deploy && mkdir -p nodejs && mkdir -p function && terraform init && terraform destroy -auto-approve -var-file=ca.tfvars
